content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
-  Pipe groups (positions x=107.5, y=-34.5 and x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of 
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
-  Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have fuel before attempting to use them.
### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electricity network before attempting to use them.
### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
-  Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them.
### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
-  Ensure that burner inserters have source items before attempting to use them.
### Errors when entities have no ingredients
-  Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
* Entity positions (x, y coordinates)
* Entity statuses (e.g. NO_FUEL, WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS, WORKING)
